Description: 3 beads in different shapes, one fragment of unworked ostrich eggshell. A: One flattened spherical bead with an edge running around the outer surface, made of white faience. B: two disc-shaped beads made of different sizes, both made of white faience. C: One small fragment of unworked ostrich eggshell, probably for producing beads.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), D14.7, second level
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
